snippet.title: The Jenny Craig Diet
snippet.description: * The Jenny Craig Diet What is it? Jenny Craig is a diet program that is nearly 30 years old. It's a three-tiered personalized weight loss program that focuses on food, body, and mind. The core of the diet is portion control that begins with pre-packaged meals, which are u...
